doc.after: World Englishes is a term for emerging localized or indigenized varieties of English especially varieties that have developed in territories influenced by the United Kingdom or the United States The study of World Englishes consists of identifying varieties of English used in diverse sociolinguistic contexts globally and analyzing how sociolinguistic histories multicultural backgrounds and contexts of function influence the use of English in different regions of the world
